description: This file is a minified JavaScript library 'vis.js' (version 4.17.0) used for dynamic, browser-based visualization. It includes library setup, feature detection, utility functions, and module definitions for visualization components.

classes.name: Network
classes.description: Main class managing visualization of networks, including nodes, edges, physics simulation, and rendering.

classes.name: PhysicsEngine
classes.description: Handles physics calculations and stabilization for network layout.

classes.name: Cluster
classes.description: Represents a group of nodes clustered together for visualization purposes.

classes.name: Edge
classes.description: Represents a connection between nodes, including visual and physical properties.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: Represents a visual node in the network with position, size, and appearance properties.

methods.name: _findBorderPositionBezier
methods.description: Calculates border position along a Bezier curve for visualization purposes.

methods.name: _getDistanceToEdge
methods.description: Computes the minimal distance from a point to an edge or boundary.

methods.name: getPoint
methods.description: Returns a point along an edge given a parameter t (0 to 1).

methods.name: setOptions
methods.description: Configures settings for visualization or specific components.

methods.name: calculateForces
methods.description: Calculates forces acting on nodes/edges for physics layout.
